name: PixelEyes
description:
PixelEyes

Artyom has been living with the same eyes for way too many years and they are starting to fail, an upgrade is needed. Since he can’t afford the last generation eyes he always dreamt of, so he will head to his last resort, Chernobyl’s Black Market, where he buys a pair of eyes, apparently in perfect condition. But in the 2043’s Russia things aren’t that easy and mafias are still running. He bought a prototype of eyes stolen from one of the biggest eyes manufacturers company and now he is trapped in some of the calibration routines included inside the pair of eyes. Since they are a prototype some strange behaviours start showing and the resolution of his eyes start going mad.

Sacrifice your screen resolution to add pixels on objects in order to complete calibration chambers! Your lasting resolution will affect your vision and also your score the last test! Score as much points as you can and share it with us! Have fun! Follow us on twitter for more updates 

https://twitter.com/pixeleyes43

Made by: Xavier Devesa, Marc Segarra, Miquel Postigo, Aniol Folch

---- Known Problems & Recomendations ----

- If you play with 2 screens connected the mouse will probalby exit the window

- Playing in Fullscreen is HIGHLY recommended
